text: I just back from your shop. I just kindly ask to your cashier ( slim Indian lady) for pay wave but she showed me very rudely. She must explain nicely to all customers. This is not the first time I had encountered. Please change to your cashier asap. This is very impolite and bad attitude.

Smiles Convenient store is at Block 6 Eunos Crescent.
Address wrongly put.
Block 12 Eunos Crescent is a residential block of Flats. There are no Smiles Convenient Store as stated via google.
They don't have pay wave and the cashiers are not that polite
Pretty average convenience store, I still prefer 7-11 but nevertheless still decent.
